name: Berlin Pedestal Basin
description: With its smooth rectangular shape that fuses simplicity of purpose with the boldness of design, the Berlin range from Hindware stands strong. Staunch and hearty in form, this range is well centered for it is inspired by the strength of Berlin architecture.

name: Kylis Pedestal Basin
description: Inspired by ornaments and gemstones, the ultimate in design, finish and craftsmanship, Kylis with its stunning looks and impeccable performance always steals the show. It embodies an illustrious look and outstanding quality with elegant cuts and a gleaming finish that take it a notch above the rest. Miles ahead with its exquisite design and chrome finish, Kylis compels you to take a second look that leaves a lingering impression. It redefines your bathroom space with its unique blend of design and everlasting quality.

name: Enigma  Semi Recessed Basin
description: State of the art is the idea behind Enigma. Reflecting beauty coupled with many contemporary aspects, this range personifies style in every way.

name: Fonte Over Counter Basin
description: For you, this means comfort without compromise. Experience your bathroom as an extraordinary living space where form and function become one. Create a space just for you – space to relax and unwind with the Fonte range from Hindware Italian Collection.

name: Edge 65 R Over Counter Basin
description: Experience grandeur at its sleekest best. Inspired by thin lines, this range of sleek stunners exudes ergonomic precision and functional versatility. With ceramic lid in wash bain, this thin rim wash basin are here to redefine luxury and lifestyle with a promice of lifestime and luster

name: Lara  Pedestal Basin
description: Hindware presents a mesmerizing collection of wash basin to transform your everyday spaces into an indulgent affair. The Lara range is inspired by the Russian word “Lara” that symbolizes protection and cheerfulness transcending the mundane. A fine example of exemplary art, this water closet range gives your bathroom space an ethereal touch. The fine curves, lustrous finish and minimalistic design justifies the name of the range – giving you a soothing sight; much like a mother nursing and protecting her baby.

name: Edge 45 S Over Counter Basin
description: Experience grandeur at its sleekest best. Inspired by thin lines, this range of sleek stunners exudes ergonomic precision and functional versatility. With ceramic lid in wash bain, this thin rim wash basin are here to redefine luxury and lifestyle with a promice of lifestime and luster

name: Cedar Half Pedestal Basin
description: We delight in bringing to you the basin with half pedestal that add a touch of elegance.

name: Median  Over Counter Basin
description: Like the middle path, like the focal line, like the common ground. Like the best of both worlds. Like the Median Range.

name: Essence  Over Counter Basin
description: The word “Essence” refers to the intrinsic nature or indispensable quality of an abstract that determines its nature. Quintessence and soulful spirits, something that inspired Hindware attractive range, Essence. This breath-taking exhibition of immaculate designs and superior performance is all what this spectacular range is all about . The sharp cuts, minimalistic design and angular shapes define the sturdy nature of this collection – all set to lend an air of urban perfection to your bathroom spaces.

name: Optra  Counter Top Basin
description: Style and modernity come together to reflect a unique blend in our range of Counter Top Basins. It is desirable yet functional.

name: Marvel  Over Counter Basin
description: An exquisite interpretation of marvel and graceful design. This dream range of Marvel WBs from Hindware is sure to turn heads; like the marvels of the universe this range will keep you enchanted.

name: Vasca  Over Counter Basin
description: Exploring lesser-known forms and curves, the Vasca range is a tribute to everyone who lives life out of the ordinary.

name: Magna  Over Counter Basin
description: We collected tangible beauty and molded them into the Magna range that spells magnificence and grace.

name: Ornate Over Counter Basin
description: We bring you Ornate, a bold, innovative design that will create an eye-catching space in your bathroom

name: Rubbic  Over Counter Basin
description: Inspired by the Rubbic’s cube, this range is about clean design and crisp planes. The range display bold geometric shapes with brilliant engineering. This collection takes into account the fact that the modern bathroom requires relaxing designs. It shows in the craftsmanship that evokes a sense of awe and calm, both at the same time. The result is an intriguing design that is at once alluring and Zen-like in its beauty.

name: Claret  Corner Basin
description: Beauty, sophistication and charm are the ultimate characters when it comes to defining our range of Claret Corner Basins. A clean and curvy design sets this range apart.

name: Monalisa  Over Counter Basin
description: Like the ardent beauty of Monalisa’s smile, the gorgeous streamlined shape of the Monalisa range help enhance the feeling of space.

name: Quadra  Over Counter Basin
description: Drawing its inspiration from the geometrical design of a quadrilateral, Quadra is an exclusive range by Hindware that speaks high of its impeccable look, excellent quality, elegant cuts and gleaming finish that leaves everyone behind. Standing atop in terms of performance the range compels you to admire its beauty leaving a lasting impression. It has the prowess to add an essence of elegance to your bath space and enhance the overall look of the décor.

name: Pearl  Over Counter Basin
description: With the same precision of quality, design and craftmanship that convulges into a exquisite pearl, we have come with an extraordinary definition of style with the Pearl range.

name: Rhapsody  Counter Top Basin
description: Free-flowing in structure, the Rhapsody range of derives inspiration from music. An air of spontaneous inspiration and a sense of improvisation make this range freer in form than a set of variations.

name: Opal  Pedestal Basin
description: Opal is a stone of inspiration which enhances imagination and creativity. Under the influence of this force, the Opal range by Hindware Art came to live.

name: Amazon Black Matte
description: Luxury design in Black colour with Matte Finish. The attractive bold look enhanced with matte exemplifies charm, class & adds a design statement in any traditional, contemporary or transitional setting.

name: Amazon White Matte
description: Luxury design in White colour with Matte Finish. The attractive bold look enhanced with matte exemplifies charm, class & adds a design statement in any traditional, contemporary or transitional setting.

name: Cedar Pedestal Basin
description: When it comes to perfection, only a few things stand out. The Cedar range by Hindware is one such masterpiece that is designed to soothe the senses. Inspired by conifers of cedar, this one strikes you hard with its angular cuts, unique shapes and novel designs. Another distinguishing factor that makes this collection a coveted one is its quality to assemble with every bathroom type without covering a lot of space. It not just aesthetically lifts your utility area but also promises a performance that is unparalleled

description: Manifesting its design inspiration from from the trident of the Neptune symbol that represents the threefold essence of nature, the Neptune range delivers in style and practicality, it matches in versatility; the comprehensive range offers a multitude of functional and beautiful bathroom solutions.

description: Like the energizing and regenerative energy of the precious Garnet stone, this range balances, strenghtens and beautifies your bathroom space.

name: Standard  Pedestal Basin

Hindware’s very own over counter Basin, EVITA has been curated and designed keeping the same aura. As the name suggests, the design of this basin is so beautiful that one look takes your breath away.

name: Opal  Pedestal
description: Opal’s wide selection of beautifully proportioned, distinctively curved, slim-rimmed ceramics gives you plenty of scope for creating an individual yet harmonious look in your bathroom.

name: Vienne  Counter Top Basin
description: The ultimate in fine-lined simplicity, inspired by the free flowing form of the river Vienne in France, this range is modern classic which will look good for years to come. The Vienne range of wash basins give you real breadth of choice when designing your bathroom.

name: Zen  Under Counter Basin
description: Following the principles of Zen, all this range are is on simple geometric shapes and are cleanly detailed to create a strikingly modern yet classic design.

name: Oval  Counter Top Basin
description: Taking its cue from elliptical design, our Oval range is a collection of beautifully formed basins that has been created to offer pioneering ceramic design with stunning visual appeal.

name: Cleo Half Pedestal Basin
description: We delight in bringing to you the basin with half pedestal that add a touch of elegance.

description: Dedicated to bringing cutting edge design and innovation to meet the demands of today’s modern bathroom schemes, Hindware Art presents a wave of new energy with the Neo Range

name: Mini Neo  Pedestal Basin
description: Dedicated to bringing cutting edge design and innovation to meet the demands of today’s modern bathroom schemes, Hindware Art presents a wave of new energy with the Neo Range

name: Cube Pedastal Basin
description: The basin and pedestal is a classic design – not just a washbasin, it offers a platform to keep toiletries and a pedestal that also neatly conceals the plumbing.

name: Studio Pedastal Basin
description: Like an artist’s workroom that pumps with creative energy all the time, a studio is a place where one defies the boundaries that has been set by the world. Celebrating the carnal nature of creativity and style, Hindware presents a design that discerns the general laws of bathroom accessories. Experience something extraordinary with Hindware’s STUDIO pedestal Basin.

name: Inox  Over Counter Basin
description: Where there’s room to express yourself, Inox range by HIC rises confidently to the occasion and brings a bring a quality of sculptural grace to your bathroom space.

name: Mini Oval  Counter Top Basin
description: Taking its cue from elliptical design, our Mini Oval range is a collection of beautifully formed basins that has been created to offer pioneering ceramic design with stunning visual appeal.

name: Studio Half Pedestal Basin
description: Like an artist’s workroom that pumps with creative energy all the time, a studio is a place where one defies the boundaries that has been set by the world. Celebrating the carnal nature of creativity and style, Hindware presents a design that discerns the general laws of bathroom accessories. Experience something extraordinary with Hindware’s STUDIO pedestal Basin.

name: Crystal  Over Counter Basin
description: A beauty as rare as the shine of a crystal, the Crystal Range of WCs is sleek, curvy and genuinely comfortable. Offering amazing smooth lines and sensual shapes; the pure and natural design is the perfect WC solution for a contemporary bathroom.

name: Tall  Pedestal
description: When does an ordinary chore become an out of the world experience? When it stuns your senses and leaves you wanting for more. Such is our range of extraordinary wash basins, merged with modern design and minimalistic dimensions. They make you feel simply special and truly unique.

name: Tango Full Pedestal Basin
description: We delight in bringing to you the basin with half pedestal that add a touch of elegance.

name: Michelangelo  Pedestal Basin
description: Inspired by the engineer of the Renaissance, Michelangelo, this range breathes in a fresh of new air. The Michelangelo range stuns your senses and leaves you wanting for more.

name: Tozzo  Over Counter Basin
description: Beautiful and immaculate inspirations have been carefully handpicked to create our range of Tozzo wash basins. Beautiful design aesthetics and usability comes together to create a defining range of basins that easily become the most charming feature of your bath space.

name: Constellation  Pedestal Basin
description: Beyond the sky lie the heavens. The final frontier, whose mysteries can never be fully unraveled. This vast and infinite space is populated with celestial bodies that are as beautiful as they are timeless. Hindware draws inspiration from these heavenly bodies and crafts an exquisite Constellation range of striking Basins with uncompromised features.

name: Viking  Pedestal Basin
description: Creative design isn’t always about thinking outside the square. With strong rectangular angles, slim walls and softened edges, Viking range of WBs is a striking design option for the modern bathroom.

name: Mario  Pedestal Basin
description: Solid and strong design, citing inspiration from Italy’s architecture, the Mario range of Hindware display form and function.

name: Aspiro Over Counter Basin
description: Sleek Elegant Design with value for money

name: Alto Pedestal Basin
description: Hitting the right pitch in every note, the Alto range may be a work of art, but it’s not just for staring at: it’s a pleasure to use too.

name: Classic Corner  Corner Basin
description: Design speaks new language but creates a familiar nostalgic feeling that lets you dive in beauty, serenity and that unmistakable classic charm.

name: Flora Pedastal Basin
description: We delight in bringing to you Flora WB with ped that add a touch of elegance and help to create a relaxing, harmonious atmosphere.

name: Lotus  Pedestal Basin
description: The Lotus range is a designer touch, inspired by the serenity and grace of of lotus petals. This range is the perfect solution to trendy schemes with a minimal amount of white porcelain on show in a floral design.

name: Delta  Pedestal Basin
description: Taking cue from mother nature’s beautiful form, the Delta range presents an aestheric that fits harmoniously into any bathroom while bringing a sense of calm.

name: Corner – B  Corner Basin
description: Hindware is always looking for ways to help you make optimum usage of your bathroom space. Our Corner range of wash basins is a design aspiration that blends in functionality with a stylish persona.

name: Ariel Pedestal Basin
description: Drawing inspiration from the graceful elegance of a gazelle, Ariel delivers a super sleek design with engineered innovation to enhance your life, so you can lose yourself in the moment and feel free every day with new energy.

name: Dune  Pedestal Basin
description: Making the most of the crescent dune shaped from the desert oasis, this range offers excellence in value and perfomance. The Dune range is here to win over your heart.

name: Windsor  Wall Hung Basin
description: The Windsor range is inspired by the royal heritage of the UK, from the bold, geometric shapes of the Art Deco era, to the subtly decorative detailing of traditional design.

name: Cleo  Pedestal Basin
description: Regal. One word for this magnificent Cleo Range that spells grandeur all over your bathroom space. Standing tall with its bold design and unsurpassed quality, the Cleo Range is inspired by the striking yet fierce beauty of Queen Cleopatra.

name: Compact  Wall Hung Basin
description: Forms of ceramic that reflect sensuousness in their very being, our Compact wash basins are especially crafted to add a touch of sophistication and a dash of glamour to your bathing spaces.

name: Cute  Wall Hung Basin
description: The cute range has a simplicity that gives space to your sense of style and self-expression. Designed and engineered to bring you the best, this shape combine contemporary chic with a twist and gives you enough space to express yourself.
